user_id.description: ID of the user who owns this configuration

bot_name.description: Friendly name for the video generation configuration

collection_name.description: Name of the MongoDB collection storing the knowledge base documents

prompt_template.description: Template string with {{context}} and {{query}} placeholders for video generation prompts

is_public.description: Whether this configuration can be accessed without authentication

mode.description: Video generation mode (currently only Standard supported)

duration.description: Length of generated video in seconds

guidance_scale.description: Controls how closely the video follows the prompt (0.0 = creative, 1.0 = precise)

negative_prompt.description: Comma-separated string of unwanted elements to exclude from video generation

negative_prompt_list.description: Array of negative prompt terms (used for editing interface)
